Date: Tuesday, 6/24/1975
Subject: I am a closer...
Why am I not your regular closer?
I wish to be traded if that doesn't change!

Regards,
Clay Carroll



Date: Wednesday, 6/25/1975
Subject: Wayne Gross learns new position
Wayne Gross has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Tuesday, 7/1/1975
Subject: Status of Larry Walko
Dear Sir,
Larry Walko isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Savannah Braves!
He has an AVG of .247, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
